title: Graph pressure and volume for constant temperature

content.question: A series of measurements are made of the pressure P and the volume V of a sample of nitrogen gas kept at a constant temperature. It is desired to represent the data graphically so that the graph will be a straight line if the behavior of the gas is ideal. Accordingly, which of the following should be plotted?

choices.label: P as a function of V
V/P as a function of V
P/V as a function of V

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
